about.name: MD. Golam All Gaffar Tasin
about.title: Seeking opportunity for University Lecturer in Computer Science
about.summary: Recent BSc in CSE graduate with a passion for teaching and research in AI. Dedicated to fostering curiosity and hands-on learning in students.

education.degree: BSc in Computer Science and Engineering

education.certification: Fundamental IT Engineer Examination of Information Technology Engineers Examination

experience.description: Delivered personalized academic instruction to students across [SSC, HSC and university level] in subjects including [Mathematics, Physics, Complex variable, Fourier Transform, Operating System, Neural Networks].

projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a full functioning e-commerce website.

projects.title: Banking System
projects.description: Developed a full functioning banking system software.

projects.title: Multiple Disease Prediction
projects.description: Implemented a predictive model to assess the risk of heart disease,diabetes and cancer utilizing machine learning algorithms.

projects.title: Tennis Game Analysis
projects.description: Developed an analytical tool to assess player performance based on statistical data collected during matches.

projects.title: 5-bit CPU
projects.description: Developed a fully functional 5-bit CPU which can perform addition, subtraction and many more operation according to control signal.

projects.title: Ceramic Tile Surface Defect Detection
projects.description: Built a real-time defect detection system to enhance quality.

publications.title: Thesis: DeepFake Image Detection: Efficient real-time detection with minimal accurcy loss.
